image.title: Agriculture Coins, Tokens, Cryptos & Assets | CryptoSlate

item.title: Blocery
item.dc:creator: CryptoSlate Coins
item.description:
Blocery records immutable and trusted data onto the blockchain such as the production, distribution, and sales history of agricultural products. Blockchain provides transactions that establish trust and transparency while streamlining the current process.

The post Blocery appeared first on CryptoSlate.
